item.title: Grails Export Dependencies
item.description: Grails 匯出專案中相依套件的 jar 環境 grails version: grails5 設定方式 在 build.gradle 新增設定 configurations { runtime.extendsFrom(compileClasspath, runtimeOnly) } task copyToLib(type: Copy) { into "$buildDir/output/lib" from configurations.runtime } 參考資料 Gathering project dependencies into folder with Gradle 7
